answers.answer: Dont u ladies think the time has really slowed down :(
Yes it has slowed down. Seems like it's taking forever now! Due Aug 27, but may be induced on the 20 due to high blood pressure.
August 14th I feel it's flying lol but I am always so busy it seems between ranch work and clothing store I feel I haven't got anything done for baby
Hooray!!! I'm due Aug 7th! For me times kinda flying . maybe cus I'm not ready and I don't have all I need and I've even been putting it off to do the hospital bags! No good.
August 29th time been flying by like in less then 3 months I will be a mommy!!!!!!!
August 21 and it is going slow. I am happy that I will be having my baby shower this month . HAve any ladies have there baby shower yet and if not when?
2nd of August I'm due :) and im so scared!! Ha x
Due Aug 5th and times flying by.  Can't wait I'm sure in a couple weeks ill say it's slowing down lol
The doctors have a induction scheduled for august 10th if i can make it that far. Sonogram tomorrow to see how big baby is due to gestational diabetes.
Due Aug 28th and its flying by for me.. just finished preping my daughters room for gifts :)
August 18 and time is flying cant wait till babyshower coming soon then I will be completed but so ready to meet my lil baby
Horray to August 27th babies I can't wait till she ces just a little longer and she will be here wootwoot

question: Hoooray for all the August mommies. Any 1 due on the 21st? Just cant wait
title: august 21st
